Articles.Content:
I just started using 1.4.2 and just hit a case where it seems to get confused about where I mean to transfer a kerbal to.  I click on the Mk1CrewCabin and the kerbal ends up in the adjacent Lander Can.  Trying to transfer the kerbal from the lander can to the crew cabin yields a "This is the source part" message.  Before I go spelunking around the logs and such, is anyone else reporting this kind of thing?

The most-suspect mod at this point is KAS, as I attached a new part (a Gravioli Detector) to the affected ship.
